climbs.name: Headless Horseman
climbs.fa: Geoff Archer and Dave Stoner, February 1990

content.description: Face climbing past two bolts with the crux getting established in the left-slanting thin crack above.
content.location:
Upper left side of the Ghost Town and about 150 feet left of

Desperado

.

climbs.name: Desperado
climbs.fa: Bob Gaines and Yvonne MacPherson, February 1989

content.description: Crux moves past a bolt gain the security of a right-slanting finger/hand crack which ends on a ledge.
content.location:
Central Ghost Town, just left of several black streaks on the rock and about 150 feet left of

Bridge of Sighs

.

climbs.name: Bridge of Sighs
climbs.fa: (TR) Bob Gaines, January 1989,  FL: Geoff Archer, February 1990

content.description:
Located at the far right end of the Ghost town, a ways right of a large tree and visible as a striking right-facing corner.

This short but high quality route packs a lot of moves into it's length and features technical stemming along with some runouts where the corner pinches down, which makes this a fairly spicy lead. Three stars out of five.

Named after the album by Robin Trower.
content.protection: Gear to 2 inches, including wires, tiny cams
